member.name: M:JetBrains.Profiler.RsMediatorBase.IProductFacade.ExecutionItemGroupReadyToStart(System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Called once per each item group.
member.param: Id of item group to execute. All group items are executed with the same configuration.
Collection of item ids. These ids will be passed to for each execution item. Execution item describes an executable file and its command line arguments

member.name: M:JetBrains.Profiler.RsMediatorBase.IProductFacade.ExecuteItem(System.String,System.String,System.String[],System.String,JetBrains.Profiler.RsMediatorBase.TheAction)
member.summary: Starts performance analysis of given executable
member.param: Callback for handling end of the item execution on the ReSharper side
